title: Trump's Planned Parenthood cuts blocked by judge
shortDescription: District Judge Indira Talwani issued a preliminary injunction, saying Trump's tax and spending law targeted Planned Parenthood's health centers.

title: Florida law could allow WSJ to 'SLAPP' Donald Trump with attorney fees
shortDescription: Florida's anti-SLAPP laws could cost Donald Trump attorney fees to the Wall Street Journal in his federal libel lawsuit.

title: Trump again says he's 'allowed to' pardon Epstein aide Ghislaine Maxwell
shortDescription: Maxwell is serving 20 years in prison for conspiring with Epstein to sexually abuse minors. Critics are calling on the Trump to release more information.

title: Trump rejects Netanyahu's claim of no starvation in Gaza
shortDescription: President Trump disagreed with Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's claim that no starvation is taking place among the people of Gaza.

title: What were EU tariffs before Trump? What to know after trade deal
shortDescription: President Donald Trump was visiting Scotland when he struck a deal with the EU president. What was the tariff on EU imports before Trump took office?

title: Democrat Roy Cooper jumps into race for North Carolina Senate seat
shortDescription: Democrats notched a big win with their recruitment of Roy Cooper for the open Senate seat being vacated by Republican Sen. Thom Tillis.

title: Trump and Starmer meet in Scotland
shortDescription: President Trump said he is focused on getting food into Gaza during a meeting with British Prime Minister Keir Starmer.

title: EU reacts to Trump’s trade deal
shortDescription: European Union leaders reacted to President Donald Trump’s 15% tariffs and $600B U.S. investment deal, warning of a new trade order.

title: DOJ looking to inspect and remove ineligible voters in swing states
shortDescription: The Department of Justice is scrutinizing how battleground states manage voter rolls, focusing on removing ineligible voters.

title: Trump trade deal with EU leaves Europe relieved − and worried
shortDescription: The Europe trade deal will see the U.S. impose a 15% import tariff on most EU goods − half the threatened rate but much more than Europeans hoped for.

title: Trump, EU come to trade deal, 15 percent tariffs
shortDescription: President Donald Trump announced the United States had reached a trade deal with the European Union, days ahead of a self-imposed Aug. 1 deadline.

title: Trump and EU reach trade deal with 15% US tariffs
shortDescription: President Donald Trump met with European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen during his trip to Scotland.

title: Mike Johnson says Maxwell pardon would give him pause, but it’s Trump’s decision
shortDescription: The House speaker said in an interview with "Meet the Press" he would have "great pause" about any commutation for the former Jeffrey Epstein associate.

title: What is Trump's approval rating? What to know about latest polls
shortDescription: A string of recent polls shows President Donald Trump's approval rating has remained largely steady over the last week.

title: Governor races set to be major referendums on Trump vs. Dems
shortDescription: From Florida to California, three-dozen states are preparing for what could be the most consequential elections in recent memory.

title: Farmers face a fork on Trump's immigration highway. So what's next?
shortDescription: Across the country, Trump’s immigration raids have roiled farms and farming communities – with cases of worker shortages and fears of unpicked crops.

title: What to know about Trump's plan to halt the production of pennies
shortDescription: Republican lawmakers in Congress are forging ahead with President Donald Trump’s plan to end the production of pennies.

title: Trump urges Thailand, Cambodia ceasefire with trade talk
shortDescription: President Donald Trump helped urge a ceasefire in the border dispute between Thailand and Cambodia by threatening to halt trade talks.

title: House Democrats look to get copy of Epstein's 'birthday book'
shortDescription: House Democrats sent a letter to lawyers of Jeffrey Epstein's estate on July 25 seeking a copy of Epstein's so-called "birthday book."

title: Trump’s Scotland visit sparks protest
shortDescription: Protesters rallied in Edinburgh as President Trump played golf at his Turnberry course during his visit to Scotland.
